results.title: Raptor
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Cynthia Potter and ACMI
results.brief_description: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne’s Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she’s got.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Cynthia Potter and ACMI
results.description: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne’s Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she’s got.

results.title: Nothing impossible
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Aden Daud and ACMI
results.brief_description: When his country was thrown into civil war, Aden Daud’s friends would tell him to just waiting for his time to die. Instead, Daud decided to do something about it and seek out a more secure life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Aden Daud and ACMI

results.title: Going forward
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Laura Bell and ACMI
results.brief_description: Laura Bell reflects on her life through the things that have made her proud. Bell’s family, her community and her achievements are what keep her driven and passionate about her work.

results.title: These things I still question
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ken Saunders and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ken Saunders questions the things in his life that he didn’t understand, like why his dad was treated differently, why he couldn’t play with the white kids and why people just let this happen.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ken Saunders and ACMI

results.title: The Most important question in the world
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, ACMI and Paul Young
results.brief_description: When Paul Young went to university, he knew he didn’t want to be a teacher. However, over time, he has seen the value of the profession and learnt that it’s not about the content, it’s about the life lessons.

results.title: Bittersweet
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, ACMI and Maria Savarino
results.brief_description: When the train from Beijing to Lhasa started running again, Maria Savarino and her husband took the opportunity to visit Tibet before it had changed forever. What they found there was a bittersweet experience they will never forget but also never revisit.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, ACMI and Maria Savarino
results.description: When the train from Beijing to Lhasa started running again, Maria Savarino and her husband took the opportunity to visit Tibet before it had changed forever. What they found there was a bittersweet experience they will never forget but also never revisit.

results.title: For the love of...Lolo
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, ACMI and Ayen Guinto
results.brief_description: When Ayen Guinto lost her beloved ‘Lolo’, her family lost the glue holding them together. She remembers him and wonders if the family should use his life as inspiration to move forward.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, ACMI and Ayen Guinto
results.description: When Ayen Guinto lost her beloved ‘Lolo’, her family lost the glue holding them together. She remembers him and wonders if the family should use his life as inspiration to move forward.
description_for_label: When Ayen Guinto lost her beloved ‘Lolo’, her family lost the glue holding them together. She remembers him and wonders if the family should use his life as inspiration to move forward.
